text:
Hi

Has any one successfully implemented a full name field in a form rather than using first/last name?

:wave: Hi everyone! I'm looking for a great HubSpot developer or developers who'd help with building a new company website this coming month :slightly_smiling_face: I hope it's okay to start my search here!

Hi,
Is it possible to associate Ticket object with Custom Object?
E.g: I want a look up field(custom object) in ticket object

Hi.
I need some help with APIs, some one know how to get marketing emails and engagement level from contacts based on companies?

Reminder: Did you know you can message <@U02162GK9SP|sprocky> at any time to get HubSpot development questions answered? It’s an experimental chat bot built to tackle developer questions. It won’t read your code, but can answer a lot of questions about building on the HubSpot platform.
Yet <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CFPRTEGTX/p1648496972300829|another hour> of my time wasted because of the undocumented `visibility` field parameter

I feel your pain brother. I'm working on a fields.js package and trying to provide documentation for these kind of things for the same reason. There's a lot of things missing, especially subproperties, and there's even quite a few things incorrectly documented.
Agreed. The docs are top notch – especially compared to some platforms – but there are a few missing puzzle pieces that really have cost me a lot of time

We are looking for ambitious engineers to join our team to help us make it better, and we are backed by investors behind Uber, Airbnb and Spotify that believe in our vision, so we can build “the opposite” of HR software, something that is made for and loved by employees. Are you interested in learning more? Please send me you resume if you are an awesome product designer (3 + years exp) or a flutter developer (3 + years exp).
